snippet.title: The Fall of Elena Temple - Playdate Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Fall of Elena Temple is a minimalistic puzzle game for Playdate. Explore rooms, avoid perils and collect all coins to progress. Rotate the crank to undo your previous falls, keeping what you've collected. Missed some coins? Rotate! Falling in some spikes? Crank!!

Get now: https://grimtalin.itch.io/fall-elena-temple

An old-school puzzle game with a faux platformer look, The Fall of Elena Temple will test your forward thinking and logical skills. Plan your falls carefully, as your undos are limited. If you're not paying attention, you'll find yourself unable to restore back to the top, with coins still needing collecting!

Official page: https://grimtalin.com/elenafall
Press kit: https://grimtalin.com/elenafall_presskit
More games: https://grimtalin.com
